Service Details: - Provides short-term support to homeless, at-risk youth, ages 13-18 years in making more positive choices and a healthy lifestyle- A transitional residential program, Penny Lane is a safe, stable home environment meeting the basic needs of the youth- Works to provide life skills and appropriate referrals while supporting and working with the youth in developing a plan to address their issues while working with other community resources in the youth's best interests
